content.text:
# List of states in the Holy Roman Empire (N)

This is a list of states in the Holy Roman Empire beginning with the letter N:
{|class="wikitable sortable"
|-
! Name
! Type
! Imperial circle
! Imperial diet
! width=50% | History
|-
|  Namur
| County1194: Margraviate
| Burg
| n/a
